snippet: The lawyer for John Giuca, who was convicted in 2005 for the murder of Mark Fisher, wrote a petition detailing serious prosecutorial misconduct and recanting witnesses.
abstract: Lawyer for John Giuca, who was convicted in 2005 for murder of New Jersey college football player Mark Fisher, has filed petition asserting that verdict should be voided due to prosecutorial misconduct and recanting witnesses; Fisher's body was found wrapped in blanket near Giuca's Brooklyn home in 2003.
lead_paragraph: The lawyer for John Giuca, who was convicted in 2005 for the murder of Mark Fisher, wrote a petition detailing serious prosecutorial misconduct and recanting witnesses.

headline.main: Petition Seeking to Void Brooklyn Murder Conviction Calls Verdict a ‘Sham’
headline.print_headline: Petition Seeking to Void Brooklyn Murder Conviction Calls Verdict a ‘Sham’
